description: Shizuka is a character from a television drama Meme and Makoto are watching. Her character is actually a reference to http://anidb.net/ch11781 [Tsukishima Shizuku] the protagonist of the Ghibli film http://anidb.net/a336 [Mimi o Sumaseba], which the drama is actually a parody of.
name: Shizuka
